body:
TC failure is #924, and is fixed on master. We can probably ignore it here.

CircleCI failure is "process out of memory", which does not bode well. We may need to move up plans to replace karma, or switch to doing dev builds in karma.

CircleCI failure is "process out of memory", which does not bode well. We may need to move up plans to replace karma, or switch to doing dev builds in karma.
body_html:
TC failure is #924, and is fixed on master. We can probably ignore it here.

CircleCI failure is "process out of memory", which does not bode well. We may need to move up plans to replace karma, or switch to doing dev builds in karma.
